directions: Process 1/2 cup of pineapple, along with the juice and oil, in a blender or food processor until pureed. Transfer to a medium bowl, along with remaining ingredients. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Refrigerate until ready to serve. (Can be made several hours before serving.)
ingredients: 1 small red bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced (optional)
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, basil or cilantro
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Pineapple Gazpacho
